Tako se to radi: Vođa navijača proteran sa stadiona do 2030. godine!
Sjajan potez Verone

05 Nov 2019

Problem rasizma opet potresa Italiju. Prozivke na rasnoj osnovi su prošlog vikenda eskalirale na Bentegodiju u Veroni gde je gostovala Breša.
Nekoliko desetina domaćih navijača je otvoreno vređalo Marija Balotelija imitirajući majmunske krike, a kontroverzni napadač poznat po kratkom fitilju nije mogao da istrpi, napucao je loptu u pravcu publike i želeo da izađe sa terena.
Većina Italijana je opet osudila rasizam na stadinu, ali bilo je i onih koji su pravili ludi i pokušavali da sakriju nešto što je očigledno. Poput Veroninog trenera Ivana Jurića ili najmoćnijeg italijanskog političara Matea Salvinija. Osokoljen što ga makar neko prećutno podržava, u javnosti se juče oglasvio vođa Luka Kastelini, vođa Veroninih ultrasa, ali i politički aktivista ksenofobične stramnke “Forca nuvoa Verona”.
Kastelini je dao skandalozan intervju u kojem je rekao da je Baloteli prozivke čuo samo u svojoj glavi i da ga niko nije vređao.“Mi rasisti? Pa i mi imamo crnčugu u našem timu i aplaudirali smo mu kad je postigao gol”, rekao je Kastelini očekujući da će proći nekažnjeno.
Na svu sreću, to se nije desilo. Verona je kao klub pokazala snagu i zdrav razum. Javnim soapštenjem je Kasteliniju istakla zabranu ulaska na stadion do juna 2030. godine! Dakle, duže od 10 godina je vođi Veroninih ultrasa zabranjen ulazak na Bentegodi. Potez za svaku pohvalu i koji se ne viđa često. Pogotovo u društvima kao što je italijansko koje ima mnogo problema sa mafijom, huliganima i korpucijom. Dovoljno je reći da su četvorica odbornika iz gradskoj skupštini Verone danas zatražila da se osudi Baloteli jer je “bez razloga doveo grad na loš glas”?!
Takođe, Verona je kao klub rešila da istraje u borbi protiv rasizma i maksimalno se stavila na raspolaganje tućiocu i policiji kako bi se identifikovalo svih dvadesetak gledalaca koji su sa tribina vređali Balotelija na rasnoj osnovi.
Ultrasi Verone su poznati kao jedni od najekstremnijih u Italiji što se tiče desničarskih političkih stavova i ovo im nije prvi put da su zbog rasizma u centru pažnje.

This is how it works: Fan leader expelled from stadium by 2030!
Great move by Verona

05 Nov 2019

The problem of racism shakes Italy again. Racial calls last weekend escalated to Bentegody in Verona, where Brescia was visiting.
Several dozen local fans openly insulted Mario Balotelli by mimicking the monkey's screams, and the controversial striker, known for his short wick, couldn't stand it, threw the ball in the direction of the crowd and wanted to get off the field.
Most Italians again condemned racism at the stadium, but there were also those who made the mad and tried to hide something that was obvious. Like Verona's coach Ivan Juric or Italy's most powerful politician, Mate Salvini. Enraged that at least someone tacitly supports him, the leader of the Port of Castellini, the leader of Verona's ultras, but also a political activist of the xenophobic film "Forca nuvoa Verona", spoke in public yesterday.
Castellini gave a scandalous interview in which he said that Baloteli had heard the calls only in his head and that no one had insulted him. "We racists? Well, we have niggers on our team, and we applauded him when he scored, "Castellini said, expecting that he would go unpunished.
Fortunately, that didn't happen. As a club, Verona showed strength and common sense. In a public announcement, she emphasized to Castellini the ban on entering the stadium until June 2030! So, for more than 10 years, the leader of Verona's ultras has been banned from entering Bentegodi. A move for every praise and not seen often. Especially in societies such as Italian, which has many problems with the mafia, hooligans and corruption. Suffice it to say that four councilors from Verona City Hall today demanded that Baloteli be condemned for "having brought the city to bad notice" for no reason ?!
Also, as a club, Verona decided to persevere in the fight against racism and made the maximum available to the prosecutor and the police to identify all twenty spectators who had insulted Balotelli on racial grounds.
Verona Ultras are known as one of the most extreme in Italy as far as right-wing political views are concerned, and this is not the first time they are the center of attention because of racism.
